theme.description: Customize branding assets, typography, and palette tokens.
theme.logoSectionDescription: Configure light and dark branding assets plus accessible alt text.
theme.fontsDescription: Select font sources, families, and weights for sans-serif and monospace styles.
theme.lightPaletteDescription: Manage color tokens used when the interface is in light mode.
theme.darkPaletteDescription: Manage color tokens used when the interface is in dark mode.
theme.dirtyMessage: You have unsaved edits. Save or reset to discard changes.
theme.pristineMessage: Theme reflects the latest saved configuration.
theme.logoLightDescription: Shown when users view the app in light mode.
theme.logoDarkDescription: Shown when users view the app in dark mode.
theme.logoAltError: Logo alt text must be 200 characters or fewer.
theme.logoAltHelper: Used by screen readers and displayed when the image cannot load.
theme.logoPreviewHint: Preview respects the selected logo URL. Uploading files generates a temporary preview URL.
theme.fontSansDescription: Primary font used for most UI content.
theme.fontMonoDescription: Used for code blocks, addresses, and numeric readouts.
theme.fontDefaultInfo: Using the bundled font. No additional configuration available.
theme.fontWeightsHelper: Enter numeric weights separated by commas. Leave blank for defaults.
theme.fontGoogleHint: Only widely-used families appear here. You can still paste any Google font family name.
theme.previewDescription: Inspect core UI elements using the configured theme tokens.
theme.previewSubheading: Sample components rendered with live tokens.
